title: Progress reported: the story of the Irish peat industry
creator_credit: Joe Mendoza, Vincent Corcoran and Irish Tourist Board
brief_description: An account of the growth of the Irish peat industry. Peat is now gathered by machinery and the industry provides employment for many people. The many uses of peat are explained - for heating, industry, and electricity.
title_for_label: Progress reported: the story of the Irish peat industry
creator_credit_for_label: Joe Mendoza, Vincent Corcoran and Irish Tourist Board
